verses.name: Numbers 31:6
verses.text: And Moses sent them to the war, a thousand of every tribe, them and Phinehas the son of Eleazar the priest, to the war, with the holy instruments, and the trumpets to blow in his hand.

verses.name: Numbers 31:7
verses.text: And they warred against the Midianites, as the Lord commanded Moses; and they slew all the males.

verses.name: Numbers 31:8
verses.text: And they slew the kings of Midian, beside the rest of them that were slain; namely, Evi, and Rekem, and Zur, and Hur, and Reba, five kings of Midian: Balaam also the son of Beor they slew with the sword.
